items.name: Kuzi Kitchen & Spice Lab
items.short_description: Dive into the heart of Swahili cuisine with interactive cooking classes, exploring ancient spice routes and traditional recipes in a vibrant, modern setting.

items.name: Pate Marine Eco-Hub
items.short_description: Discover Lamu's vibrant marine life at this new conservation center. Participate in turtle releases, coral reef monitoring, or explore mangrove ecosystems via guided dhow tours.

items.name: Mkunguni Modern Art Space
items.short_description: Experience the pulse of contemporary East African art in Lamu. This gallery showcases emerging and established artists with a focus on Swahili heritage and modern interpretations.
items.address: Shela Village, next to Peponi Hotel

items.name: Koreni Serenity Shala
items.short_description: Find your inner peace at Lamu's newest wellness sanctuary. Offering daily yoga, meditation, and holistic therapies amidst tranquil gardens and ocean breezes.

items.name: Swahili Threads & Treasures
items.short_description: Discover ethical fashion and unique handmade crafts at this community-driven boutique. Featuring locally sourced materials and traditional artisan techniques.

items.name: Funguni Living History House
items.short_description: Step back in time at this interactive house museum. Experience daily Swahili life, traditional practices, and oral histories passed down through generations.

items.name: Mkoko Glamping Retreat
items.short_description: Reconnect with nature at this luxurious eco-glamping site on Manda Island. Enjoy breathtaking views, private beach access, and sustainable living under the stars.
items.address: Northern Manda Island, accessible by boat

items.name: Jahazi Narratives & Ngoma Center
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in traditional Swahili storytelling, poetry recitals, and vibrant musical performances at this intimate cultural space.
items.address: Near Old Post Office, Lamu Old Town

items.name: Kipepeo Kids' Eco-Park
items.short_description: A safe and stimulating outdoor play area for children, focusing on nature exploration, traditional games, and environmental awareness, built with sustainable materials.
items.address: Mainland, opposite Shela, accessible by small boat

items.name: Bustani Rooftop & Bites
items.short_description: Enjoy panoramic views of Lamu Old Town and spectacular sunsets while savoring fresh juices, Swahili snacks, and light meals in this breezy rooftop garden.
items.address: Rooftop, above Old Dispensary, Lamu Old Town
